required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Two Monthly Contact Lenses
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of Two Monthly Contact Lenses

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to explore overall vision with BIOFINITY® ENERGYS™ contact lenses as compared to BIOFINITY® contact lenses after one week of wear.

primary_outcome.description: Overall vision will be assessed binocularly (both eyes together) by the subject on a 10-point scale, where 1=poor and 10=excellent.

secondary_outcome.description: Over-refraction (amount of additional correction needed to improve visual acuity (VA)) will be collected for each eye and measured in diopters.

arm_group.description: Comfilcon A with Digital Zone Optics™ contact lenses worn first, followed by comfilcon A contact lenses. Each product will be worn bilaterally (in both eyes) for 7 days in a daily wear modality.
Comfilcon A contact lenses worn first, followed by comfilcon A with Digital Zone Optics™ contact lenses. Each product will be worn bilaterally (in both eyes) for 7 days in a daily wear modality.

intervention.intervention_name: Comfilcon A with Digital Zone Optics™ contact lenses
intervention.description: Silicone hydrogel spherical contact lenses with Digital Zone Optics™
